productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Add a dash of smart style to your life with the new range of smart watch from Alcatel. Configure it to your Android or iOS phone and take charge of phone from the back of your hand. Remote control your music, phone camera just at the tap of your smartwatch. Monitor your exercise regime and heart beat while you enjoy your daily jog. It the sheer pleasure of convenience at your fingertips when you can do so much without even touching your phone.

productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Some functions can be boring. But with this blush leather smartwatch from Motorola on your wrist, you don’t just look stylish but can discretely check messages on Gmail so time passes. The watch comes with apps that make your life easier. With Spotify, you can listen to songs anytime and anywhere. With a built-in activity tracker, you can keep a check on your health. productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Modish, unobtrusive and state-of-the-art, the Gear IconX earbuds will make listening to your favourite playlist all the more enjoyable.
